channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: This is BBC Four
channel.desc: Programmes start at 7.00pm.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Deer in the City
channel.desc: Short film about a pair of roe deer who have made a Scottish cemetery their home. These normally shy creatures are a magical addition to a city's urban population.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Miss Marple
channel.desc: A young woman is haunted by feelings of fear and dread, and turns to Miss Marple in order to understand what may have happened in her childhood.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Miss Marple
channel.desc: Gwenda and Miss Marple are closer to understanding the mystery of a seemingly perfect crime from many years previously.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Beck
channel.desc: Three young men dressed as delivery men overpower a middle-aged couple in a luxury apartment, and at first it looks like a brutal robbery. Contains strong language and some violent scenes.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Muhammad Ali
channel.desc: Muhammad Ali is one of the most photographed men in history. But just a handful of iconic shots and private snaps reveal a new story: an extraordinary life through a unique lens.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Parkinson Meets Muhammad Ali
channel.desc: Michael Parkinson searches the archives and revisits four outstanding interviews with the late boxing legend Muhammad Ali.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: The Good Life
channel.desc: After Tom brainstorms an idea for revamping the cultivator into a transport vehicle, the Goods try their hand at becoming a housekeeping service to the Leadbetters to earn cash.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Yes Minister
channel.desc: Sitcom about a government minister. Hacker must choose between toeing the party line and doing what the civil service want him to do.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Miss Marple
channel.desc: A young woman is haunted by feelings of fear and dread, and turns to Miss Marple in order to understand what may have happened in her childhood.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Miss Marple
channel.desc: Gwenda and Miss Marple are closer to understanding the mystery of a seemingly perfect crime from many years previously.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Muhammad Ali
channel.desc: Ten pictures, from iconic shots to private snaps, reveal the life of Muhammad Ali.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: This is BBC Four
channel.desc: Programmes start at 7.00pm.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Eisteddfod 2025 with Huw Stephens
channel.desc: Huw Stephens is in Wrexham to bring all the highlights and stories from this spectacular showcase for music, dance, literature, theatre, circus, art and original performances.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Eisteddfod 2025 with Huw Stephens
channel.desc: Huw Stephens brings all the highlights and stories from the National Eisteddfod - a vibrant mix of music, dance, art, literature, theatre, circus, original performances and so much more.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Paul Lewis Remembers... Alfred Brendel
channel.desc: Paul Lewis provides a glimpse into the life and career of a performer assured of his place as one of the greatest musicians of the postwar era, classical pianist Alfred Brendel.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Alfred Brendel
channel.desc: A profile of world-renowned pianist Alfred Brendel, following him over two years and intimately exploring the musical and non-musical influences that have shaped his life and work.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Brendel in Performance
channel.desc: A recital by world-renowned pianist Alfred Brendel, filmed at the Snape Maltings Concert Hall in Suffolk and featuring works by Schubert, Haydn and Mozart.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Brendel Plays Mozart at the Proms 1984
channel.desc: Richard Baker introduces a performance of Mozart's Symphony No 35 in D and Piano Concerto No 27 in B Flat with piano soloist Alfred Brendel and the Scottish Chamber Orchestra.
